solution_line_template: The conference center can hold up to {room_capacity} x {num_rooms} = <<{room_capacity}*{num_rooms}={total_capacity}>>{total_capacity} people.
Today, there are {total_capacity} x {fullness_fraction} = <<{total_capacity}*{fullness_fraction}={people_in_center}>>{people_in_center} people in the conference center.
